Articles.Content: After finding TriggerAu's Transfer Window Planner I said, "Why not make AlterBaron's Aerobraking Calculator available in-game as well? It could pull the orbital data straight from the game and, if using FAR, use that aerodynamic data. It would be brilliant!" Then I said, "I don't have the skill or time to do that." Then I said, "Stop talking to yourself. This is why everyone is always looking at you funny."

I think we already have something better: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/104694-0-90-Trajectories-v1-1-0-%282014-12-24%29-atmospheric-predictions

It predicts atmospheric interaction pretty well and display it as continued orbit lines, so you don't have to look at number as much.

Also works with FAR.
